item.title: Crypto app!
item.description: Hello out there again. This is my second post here and I will be talking about the app I developed after submitting a work to SER - International Seminar on Statistics with R, hosted by UFF (Universidade Federal Fluminense). The intention of this app is to provide an automatized solution for visualizing and modeling crypto data. The whole logic followed this path: Create a logic to get data from here Get apps

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
